entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (collections_ice_cream_part_six.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: I might be.  Who is asking?
entries.s_12: I just wanted to ask you about this fryer.
entries.s_14: Let me see that contraption.  Yeah...I used to put these together in a factory.  That was a long time ago.  How did you get this?
entries.s_16: I found it.  Can you help me reverse engineer it?
entries.s_18: Well.  Not really.  The only thing I ever worked on was the ventilation system.
entries.s_19: What did the ventilation system do exactly?
entries.s_20: It blew cool air over the heating element and kept the fryer enclosure itself from becoming too hot.  That is basically all I know.  Here.  It's this unit right here.
entries.s_24: Anyone else at the factory with you that might know more?
entries.s_25: As a matter of fact yes. I worked with Lepwalk C'han in the factory.  I think he might know about the Oil Filtration System.  Here is his current location.  Tell him I said 'Hello.'
entries.s_26: This is a dangerous area.  You should head back because if you get lost, no one will find you.
